item.title: GOP rep urges lawmakers to ‘right-size’ bloated bureaucracy, national debt: ‘Wheels are coming off the wagon’
item.description: Rep. Jodey Arrington, R-Texas, said that a Republican budget reconciliation bill will help usher in President Donald Trump's "rocket ship economy."

item.title: NIH closes experimentation labs accused of brutally killing thousands of beagles for 40+ years
item.description: Under the leadership of President Donald Trump, National Institutes of Health (NIH) shut down its beagle testing laboratory.
